com.kme.kaltura.kmesdk.controller

Interface IKmeWebRTCController

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IKmeRoomController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KmeRoomControllerImpl, KmeRoomService

    public IKmeWebRTCController

    An interface for wrap actions with interface IKmePeerConnectionController

    See Also:
    interface IKmePeerConnectionController
